org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.wapa
Class WAPAConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.wapa.WAPAConverter

public class WAPAConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class provides methods for converting weak alternating parity automata (WAPA) to or from a Büchi automaton (NBW).

Author:
Yi-Wen Chang, ported by Ming-Hsien Tsai

Nested Class Summary
(package private) static class WAPAConverter.DualWAPAConverter
          This is a converter that can take the dual of a WAPA.
(package private) static class WAPAConverter.NBW2WAPAConverter
          This is a converter that can convert an NBW to an equivalent WAPA.
(package private) static class WAPAConverter.WAPA2NBWConverter
          This is a converter that can convert a WAPA to an equivalent NBW.

public static AltAutomaton fromNBW(FSA aut)
Converts an NBW to an equivalent weak alternating parity automaton (WAPA).

Parameters:
aut - an NBW
Returns:
an equivalent weak alternating parity automaton (WAPA)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an NBW

fromNBW

protected static AltAutomaton fromNBW(FSA aut,
                                      java.util.Map<AltState,State> map)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts an NBW to an equivalent weak alternating parity automaton (WAPA).

Parameters:
aut - an NBW
map - a store for the map from a state in the returned WAPA to the corresponding state in aut
Returns:
an equivalent weak alternating parity automaton (WAPA)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an NBW

Parameters:

Returns:
the dual of wapa
Throws:

toNBW

public static FSA toNBW(AltAutomaton aut)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts an alternating parity automaton in CNF to an equivalent NBW.

Parameters:
aut - an alternating parity automaton in CNF
Returns:
an equivalent NBW
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an alternating parity automato in CNF

toNBW

protected static FSA toNBW(AltAutomaton aut,
                           java.util.Map<AltState,State> map)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts an alternating parity automaton in CNF to an equivalent NBW.

Parameters:
aut - an alternating parity automaton in CNF
map - a map from a state in aut to the corresponding state in the source NBW, which is the complement of the returned NBW
Returns:
an equivalent NBW
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an alternating parity automato in CNF
